item.name: Ferguson Hart Estate
item.address1: Cnr Pile Road/Garden Court Drive, Ferguson Valley, WA 6236
item.description: Merv Hart and family have established shiraz (1.1ha), sauvignon blanc and semillon (0.6ha each) on gravelly soils on north-facing slopes. State-of-the-art viticultural techniques are used to keep vigour and yield under control. An art gallery and coffee shop operate on weekends.
